## Using mtcars as a default

```{r}
data(mtcars)
head(mtcars)
```

```{r}
some_vars <- function(df, var_list){
  {{df}} %>% 
    select({{var_list}}) %>% 
  summary()
}

some_vars(mtcars, c(mpg,cyl))
```
